attributes.action: Allow us to publicly disagree with an e-petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If I could sign my name against e-petitions to indicate that I disagee, this would be welcome. This would discourage spurious petitions and give the government a better idea of the true nature of public opinion.

rejection.details: We will take this seriously as feedback.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
